item.title: Questions for Measuring Software Team Engagement
item.description:
Engagement is a powerful determinant of team performance. If you lead a software team, then you should care about its degree of engagement. Measure engagement to track and guide its improvement.

This post gives questions to use in a survey that measures engagement of your software team.

item.title: Test-Driven Development of Dev Environments
item.description: This post shows how to create a direnv-based dev environment using test-driven development.
